title: AWS Deploy
description: Deployment of Angular CLI applications to AWS

configuration.description: A named build target, as specified in the `configurations` section of angular.json. Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target. Same as `ng build --configuration=XXX`.

baseHref.description: This is an example how to override the workspace set of options. --- Base url for the application being built. Same as `ng build --base-href=/XXX/`.

secretAccessKey.description: The secret access key from AWS.

cfDistributionId.description: Optional AWS CloudFront distribution id to create an invalidation.

buildTarget.description: A named build target, as specified in the `configurations` section of angular.json . Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target. This is equivalent as calling the command `ng build --configuration=XXX`.
